data.expected_result: The CSS of the site should put the 'X' in the top left corner.
data.short_description: Not able to close side panel on Samsung S9+ running Samsung Internet and Google Chrome. Discord Dev Portal
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: open the discord dev portal in Samsung Internet - Step 2: open the sidebar - Step3: Rotate your device horizontally. - Step 4. There is now no possible way to close the side panel. -
